nodes.text: Samar was a male Khil, who served the Galactic Republic during the time of the Jedi Civil War.

Samar served the Republic as an officer within Republic Intelligence. In 3957 BBY, Samar was among a team of Republic agents who went on a mission to the planet Sernpidal, where they recovered a code cylinder that held the command codes for the sensor systems on Darth Revan's flagship. Afterwards, they traveled to the Republic ship Viscount and assisted the Jedi Bastila Shan in a mission to capture the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Revan. During the mission, Samar and the other agents encountered the Sith apprentice Darth Voren.
